definition: to do/to manage/to handle/to go about/to run/to set up/to deal with

sentences.english: The office in BeiJing will offer the help according to the condition.
sentences.chinese: 北京市外辦將酌情協助安排。

sentences.english: The foreign office of Jilin Province has already informed relevant embassies in China.
sentences.chinese: 吉林省外辦已將上述情況通報了有關國家駐華使館。

sentences.english: Greetings from Law Wang, Translators'Study, Hefei Foreign Affairs Office.
sentences.chinese: 合肥市外辦翻譯室王冀皖向您致以敬意。

sentences.english: The Beijing Municipal Foreign Affairs Office shall, depending on circumstances, assist them in making the due arrangements.
sentences.chinese: 北京市外辦將酌情協助安排。
